0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Karthus enters a  zombie state for 7 seconds, during which he can cast his abilities at no cost. If  Defile has been learned, it will remain toggled on for Death Defied's entire duration.  Requiem becomes disabled after Death Defied has lasted 4 seconds.

1.text: While under this state, Karthus becomes  untargetable and  immune to crowd control as well as prevents all incoming damage, but is also rendered unable to move, declare basic attacks, use summoner spells, and activate items.

0.text: Active: Karthus conjures a blast at the target location that detonates after 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds, granting  sight of the area and dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when only one target is struck.

1.text: Lay Waste deals 95% damage to  monsters.

2.text: During  Death Defied, Lay Waste will cast at maximum range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Karthus erects a wall of pain at the target location perpendicular to his facing that lasts 5 seconds, granting  sight around its pillars and center.

1.text: Enemies that touch the wall are inflicted with  15% magic resistance reduction and become  slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration. Enemies can be affected by Wall of Pain only once per cast.

0.text: Passive: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills an enemy.

1.text: Toggle: Karthus surrounds himself in a necrotic aura that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off triggers a final tick of damage.

2.text: Defile cannot be toggled off during  Death Defied.

0.text: Active: Karthus  channels for 3 seconds, then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy champions upon completion.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • dring

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+100 ability power
+200 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CINDERBLOOM: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a  shield within the last 5 seconds.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

Enemies that touch the wall are inflicted with  15% magic resistance reduction and become  slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration. Enemies can be affected by Wall of Pain only once per cast.

Enemies that touch the wall are inflicted with  15% magic resistance reduction and become  slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration. Enemies can be affected by Wall of Pain only once per cast.
Passive: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills an enemy.
Toggle: Karthus surrounds himself in a necrotic aura that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off triggers a final tick of damage.
Toggle: Karthus surrounds himself in a necrotic aura that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off triggers a final tick of damage.
Active: Karthus  channels for 3 seconds, then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy champions upon completion.

Active: Karthus conjures a blast at the target location that detonates after 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds, granting  sight of the area and dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when only one target is struck.

Active: Karthus conjures a blast at the target location that detonates after 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds, granting  sight of the area and dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when only one target is struck.
